text: @narendramodi Respect Sir, I beg to say that I'm from Mumbai and currently stay in Delhi for job but due to Covid-19 my job is left and I'm job less i can't able to pay my rent so plz help me as soon as possible plz it's my humble rqst Sir. I know uhh received thousand no. Of post thq...
